START.error_critical:
âŒ A critical error occurred: {error}
Please try again or contact support.
START.error_send_welcome: âŒ Error sending welcome message. Please try again or contact support.
START.new_user_description: Hello {username}! Your personal translator is ready to use.
START.returning_user_description: Hello {username}! Your translator is ready to use.
START.getting_started_value:
â€¢ Use `/daily` to claim daily points
â€¢ Try `/texttr` for your first translation
â€¢ Check `/shop` for temporary upgrades
â€¢ Use `/help` for detailed commands
START.admin_tips_value:
â€¢ Use `/setchannel` to restrict translation to specific channels/languages
â€¢ Use `/invite` to add Muse to more servers
â€¢ Use `/help` for all commands
START.daily_claimed_value: Come back tomorrow for more points!
START.voice_commands_value:
`/voicechat [source] [target]` - Real-time voice chat translation
`/voicechat2 [lang1] [lang2]` - Enhanced bidirectional translation
`/voice [text] [source] [target]` - Text to speech translation
`/speak [text] [source] [target]` - Translate and play in voice channel
START.text_commands_value:
`/texttr [text] [source] [target]` - Translate text
`/autotranslate [source] [target]` - Auto-translate all your messages
`/read [message_id] [target]` - Translate any sent message by ID
`/dmtr [user] [text] [source] [target]` - Send translated DM
START.achievements_value:
`/achievements` - View your achievement progress
`/rewards` - Check your points and rank
`/cashout` - Convert achievement points to activity points
`/daily` - Claim daily points
`/shop` - Browse point shop
`/buy [item]` - Purchase items from shop
`/buypoints [amount]` - Purchase additional points
`/gift [amount]` - Gift your friends points
`/profile` - View your profile
`/leaderboard` - See top users
`/transactions` - View point transaction history
START.settings_value:
`/hide` or `/show` - Toggle original text visibility
`/preferences` - Adjust language preferences
`/history` - View translation history
`/list` - See all supported languages
`/upgrade` - Unlock premium features
`/help` - Full command list
`/stop` - End translation session
START.community_value:
`/feedback` - Rate and review Muse (earn points!)
`/reviews` - See what other users are saying
`/invite` - Share Muse with friends (earn points!)
`/vote` - Support the bot on bot-listing sites (earn points!)
START.upgrade_benefits_value:
ğŸ¥‰ **Basic ($1/month):** 500 chars, 1h voice, history access
ğŸ¥ˆ **Premium ($3/month):** 2000 chars, 2h voice, priority processing
ğŸ¥‡ **Pro ($5/month):** Unlimited everything + beta features
START.premium_active_value:
â€¢ Enhanced limits: {text_limit} chars
â€¢ Voice time: {voice_limit} minutes
â€¢ Point multiplier: {multiplier}
â€¢ Thank you for supporting Muse! ğŸ’–
START.language_format_value:
You can use language names or codes:
â€¢ Names: `English`, `Spanish`, `Japanese`
â€¢ Codes: `en`, `es`, `ja`
â€¢ Example: `/texttr text:'Hello World' source_lang:English target_lang:Spanish`
START.footer_server: Server Mode: {server} | Join our support server: discord.gg/VMpBsbhrff
START.footer_dm: User Mode: Perfect for DMs | Join our support server: discord.gg/VMpBsbhrff

HELP.title: ğŸ¤– Muse Translator - Command List
HELP.description: Here are all the available commands:
HELP.reward_value:
`/daily` - Claim your daily reward
`/shop` - View the reward shop
`/buy [reward]` - Purchase rewards using points
`/profile [user]` - View your profile and stats
`/rewards` - View your active rewards
`/gift [user] [amount]` - Gift points to others
HELP.social_value:
`/leaderboard` - See the top point earners
`/achievements` - View achievements and badges
`/cashout` - Redeem achievement points in the `/shop`
`/transactions` - View your point transaction history
HELP.setup_value_admin:
`/setchannel [channel_id]` - Set your translation channel and language perms
`/stop` - Stop any active translation sessions
HELP.settings_value:
`/hide` - Hide original message in translations
`/show` - Show original message in translations
`/preferences` - Customize your default languages
`/history` - View your translation history
HELP.info_value:
`/list` - View all supported languages
`/upgrade` - View premium options
`/invite` - Get bot invite links
`/vote` - Get bot listing links
`/help` - Show this command list
HELP.readimage_value: `/readimage [target_lang]` - Extract and translate image text using OCR
HELP.context_value: `Right-click message â†’ Apps â†’ Read Message` - Translate any message
HELP.tips_value:
â€¢ Use `auto` to auto-detect language
â€¢ Language codes: `en`, `es`, `fr` or names: English, Spanish, French
â€¢ Earn points daily and buy temporary premium perks!
â€¢ Example: `/texttr text:'hola' source_lang:es target_lang:en`

HELP.footer_dm: User Mode: Best in DMs | Some features are server-only | Use `/daily` for points!

AUTOTRANSLATE.error_not_allowed_desc: Translations to this language are not allowed in this channel. Please use an approved channel or language.
AUTOTRANSLATE.error_invalid_source_desc:
Invalid source language: '{language}'
Use /list to see available languages or use 'auto' for automatic detection.
AUTOTRANSLATE.error_invalid_target_desc:
Invalid target language: '{language}'
Use /list to see available languages.
AUTOTRANSLATE.already_enabled_desc: Auto-translation is already enabled with these exact settings in this channel.
AUTOTRANSLATE.enabled_desc: All your messages in this channel will now be automatically translated!
AUTOTRANSLATE.how_it_works_value:
â€¢ **Type normally** - Your messages will be auto-translated
â€¢ **Commands ignored** - Messages starting with `/` won't be translated
â€¢ **Same channel only** - Only works in this specific channel
â€¢ **Smart detection** - Skips messages that don't need translation
AUTOTRANSLATE.important_notes_limited:
â€¢ Messages over **{limit} characters** will be skipped
â€¢ **{tier} tier** users get priority processing
â€¢ Use `/upgrade` for unlimited characters
AUTOTRANSLATE.important_notes_unlimited:
â€¢ **Unlimited** message length
â€¢ **Priority processing** for all translations

READ.how_to_get_id_field: ğŸ” How to Get Message ID
READ.how_to_get_id_value:
1. **Enable Developer Mode** in Discord Settings > Advanced
2. **Right-click** the message you want to translate
3. **Click 'Copy Message ID'**
4. **Paste the ID** in this command
READ.error_message_not_found_desc: Could not find a message with that ID in this channel.
READ.troubleshooting_value:
â€¢ **Check the ID** - Make sure you copied it correctly
â€¢ **Same channel** - Message must be in this channel
â€¢ **Not deleted** - Message might have been deleted
â€¢ **Permissions** - You need to see the message to translate it
